ideas.description: Using for-loop to calculate sum and product of a list
ideas.implementation:
module SumProductFor
    use int.Int
    use list.List
    use list.Length
    use list.NthNoOpt

    let sum_product_for (t : list int) : (int, int) =
        let n = length t in
        let ref sum = 0 in
        let ref product = 1 in
        for i = 0 to n - 1 do
            sum <- sum + nth i t;
            product <- product * nth i t
        done;
        (sum, product)
end

ideas.description: Using while-loop to calculate sum and product of a list
ideas.implementation:
module SumProductWhile
    use int.Int
    use list.List
    use list.Length
    use list.NthNoOpt

    let sum_product_while (t : list int) : (int, int) =
        let n = length t in
        let ref i = 0 in
        let ref sum = 0 in
        let ref product = 1 in
        while i < n do
            sum <- sum + nth i t;
            product <- product * nth i t;
            i <- i + 1
        done;
        (sum, product)
end

ideas.description: Using recursion and pattern matching to calculate sum and product
ideas.implementation:
module SumProductRecurPattern
    use int.Int
    use list.List

    let rec sum_product_recur_pattern (t : list int) : (int, int) =
        match t with
        | Nil -> (0, 1)
        | Cons x xs -> let (sum, product) = sum_product_recur_pattern xs in
                        (x + sum, x * product)
        end
end

ideas.description: Using accumulator within recursion to calculate sum and product
ideas.implementation:
module SumProductRecurAccumulator
    use int.Int
    use list.List

    let rec sum_product_recur_accumulator (t : list int) (acc_sum : int) (acc_product : int) : (int, int) =
        match t with
        | Nil -> (acc_sum, acc_product)
        | Cons x xs -> sum_product_recur_accumulator xs (acc_sum + x) (acc_product * x)
        end

    let sum_product_recur (t : list int) : (int, int) =
        sum_product_recur_accumulator t 0 1
end

ideas.description: Using recursion and branching (if-then-else) to calculate sum and product
ideas.implementation:
module SumProductRecurBranching
    use int.Int
    use list.List

    let rec sum_product_recur_branching (t : list int) : (int, int) =
        match t with
        | Nil -> (0, 1)
        | Cons x xs -> let (sum, product) = sum_product_recur_branching xs in
                        ((if true then x + sum else sum), (if true then x * product else product))
        end
end
